comment.author: 29079609@N02
comment._content: he has his own museum www.francisledwidge.com/index.php?option=com_content&... Lance Corporal Francis Edward Ledwidge . 1st Bn Royal Inniskilling Fusiliers ~ Died on 31st July 1917 aged 29. He was the son of Patrick and Anne Ledwidge, of Slane, Co. Meath A prolific poet noted for his pastoral pieces about Ireland; his last poems made subtle reference to war. He had already served in Gallipoli and Salonika with the 5th Bn of the Inniskillings before returning to France with the 1st Bn in December 1916. iwvpa.net/ledwidgefe/index.php

comment.author: 35234565@N04
comment._content: Thanks to all of you for the excellent links, and for deciphering the date.  We'll add the date, and fill in the name the next time we update the record.
